label: Hexaemeron (Basil of Caesarea)
uniform_title: Basil, Saint, Bishop of Caesarea, approximately 329-379. Hexaemeron
description: A commentary on the six days of Creation. The first of its kind, this style of commentary, called Hexaemeron, flourished in late antiquity, and later commentaries drew on Basil's as a model.
